revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox battle item |name = Charcoal |image = [[File:Charcoal.png|100px]] |caption = In game image of the ''Charcoal'' |location = [[Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Charcoal''' is a type of [[Held Items|Held Item]] that can only be equipped to [[File:Fire_Type_icon.png|30px]]Fire type Pokémon. ==Details== Raises the attack of the Pokémon holding the Item by 10%. ==Acquistion== {{Loot/head‎|Battle items}} {{LootItem|Burned Tower|Legendary|N/..."
